name: Nighthawking
description:
A small RPG about stealing things from the dead.

Made in RPG Maker XP over about two weeks.

Uses DragonDePlatino's DawnLike tiles (which use DawnBringer's nice 16-color palette), some of Redshrike's monsters from Heroine Dusk, some music tracks by AllergicRacoon, and one by Sudocolon (all CC 3.0 assets from opengameart.org)

The 'demo' is a much shorter version of the game made as a proof-of-concept. The 'art test' was whipped together before even that to make sure the tiles looked okay in RPG Maker.
